name: Game Rerising
description:
An epic adventure fantasy game where you will play the legendary warrior "John Character". Through the journey you will be escorted by the all-knowing narrator, there especially to help you navigate through this wonderful world. This game also allows you with a full character creator, with a recently repaired "Start" button. 

This Game was Developed, Written, and Drawn by Yanay Gilday  @GildayYanay
Music by Dotan Krispin @Kryspynator
The Narrator voiced by Smurf 

Full Gameplay and solutions:
